Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3801_10.jpg'}
{3: 'In a corner of another world, humans sleep eternally.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Middle-aged Man', 3: 'Half a bottle left... Gotta be careful with this.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Underneath the ragged, holey cloak, his big frame shows no sign of importance.'}
{3: 'He takes off his water bottle and gives it to the person next to him, who is making raspy noises.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Young Man', 3: 'T-thank you.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The pale young man takes the bottle, tapping it gently, listening to the water hit the metal.'}
{3: 'Then he carefully unscrews the cap, tilts his head back, and lets a few drops of water trickle into his mouth.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Middle-aged Man', 3: "Once we get through the canyon, we'll...", 4: '1'}
{3: "He's not wasting his breath on another word."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory709.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{3: 'The aurora hangs overhead like blue flames, and the man at the front raises his lamp again.'}
{3: 'Dirty, ragged refugees form a long line, trudging across the snowy wasteland and through broken rock canyons.'}
{3: 'Panting reindeer are pushed forward with sticks, their saddlebags almost empty.'}
{3: 'Rich and poor, educated and simple, famous and unknown—they all walk together. These refugees are an army without a home.'}
{3: "They've left behind their grapes, olives and figs, their useless tech, their altars, fireplaces, and graves."}
{3: 'This land was once theirs, but their homeland has been completely destroyed.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory709.jpg'}
{3: 'They refuse to board the spaceships, wanting only to stay here...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Elder', 3: "What's that sound?", 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory93.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{3: "Broken walls stand crooked at the canyon's end, like a statue pointing to the sky."}
{3: 'The worn echo wall stretches the sounds from their destination into long, echoing sounds.'}
{2: 'Faint Singing Voice', 3: '～When we shed this mortal flesh...～'}
{3: 'The music cuts through the cold wind, its slightly off-key sound making it seem like a dream.'}
{2: 'Faint Singing Voice', 3: '～To awaken or sleep forever. Who can say...～'}
{3: 'The faint sound in their ears gets clearer, giving the tired travelers hope.'}
{3: 'The refugees finish their long journey, heading toward the camp.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg5101_05.jpg'}
{3: "The minstrel's fingers dance on the strings, humming a story. Around the fire, people remember the past, carried by the music."}
{3: 'A woman with pink hair sits among the others, listening quietly to the song.'}
{2: 'Barniga', 3: 'Sing with joy—'}
{3: '～Though surrounded by grief, there was a place where joy once reigned.～'}
{3: '～Mountains stood tall and rivers were rushing there.～'}
{3: '～A pure land defended by brave people.～'}
{2: 'Barniga', 3: '～They lit the dark with candles...～'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory397.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory591.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory591.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory829.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory829.jpg'}
{3: 'The first fusion reactor, the first permanent moon base, and the promise of reason and prosperity.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory859.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory859.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory949.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory949.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory592.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory592.jpg'}
{3: 'The Tycho telescope, the "Dawn-III" spaceship, and colony ships being built on the moon.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1110.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{3: 'People go back to the universe they dream of, feeling the same sunlight as their ancestors.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1110.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory334.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{3: 'Long ago, visitors from beyond gave life to our planet, which was covered in fire and lava.'}
{3: 'And when the Golden Age came, those big questions in our genes seemed like we could finally answer them.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3801_10.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Middle-aged Man', 3: 'Ah... Those were the good old days...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The man in the cloak sips his hot soup, letting out a relieved sigh.'}
{3: "The campfire's bright flames reflect in his cloudy eyes, showing the world as it used to be."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Young Man', 3: 'That was a lifetime ago...', 4: '1'}
{3: "The young man seems to agree, but what he's mumbling sounds more like he's lost his mind."}
{3: 'After all, only the very old here actually lived in the world that song describes.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'An old woman warms herself by the fire, dozing, not hearing them. The singer finishes the song and then is quiet for a moment.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Barniga', 3: 'My teacher taught me these lyrics.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The limits of language are the limits of the world.'}
{3: 'Humans made miracles and then spread legends through time and space with their voices and ears.'}
{3: 'Human songs go beyond the disaster, heard all over the world.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Middle-aged Man', 3: 'When will this ever end...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He frowns, sighing heavily in resignation.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Young Man', 3: 'Is this ever going to stop...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The young man stares blankly into the fire.'}
{3: "He's barely had any peaceful time his whole life. Always moving, chased by the Red Tide, and moving again..."}
{3: "He's never stayed in one place for more than a year."}
{3: 'This sad song arouses bitterness deep in their hearts, and for a moment, only painful sighs and desperate silence fill the air.'}
{3: 'The strings make a jarring noise, cutting off the sad tune. The singer pauses, digging through her memories for hope.'}
{2: 'Barniga', 3: 'Actually, this song... My teacher taught me another verse once...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She softly plucks the strings, and a new tune begins to rise.'}
{2: 'Barniga', 3: "～Faith burns like a guiding light... Look! The pioneers' tracks are everywhere, rising from the ashes.～", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Barniga', 3: '～A rusty blade bites into a palm.～', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Barniga', 3: '～Scars turn into trenches. We find rebirth in our breaking...～', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The singer strums the strings harder.'}
{3: 'This is a well-known legend, bright and clear like starlight and Empyrea.'}
{3: 'The pink-haired woman, hood back, sits quietly, listening closely to the song.'}
{3: "The song fades out, and the crackling fire takes over again. Hot soup warms people up, but it can't dilute the thick silence."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Young Man', 3: 'Sing us a new song.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Young Man', 3: 'Sing about our lives now! I can even play something!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He pulls out a metal piece from his wet bag, unwrapping it carefully.'}
{3: "The frost hasn't damaged his treasure—a rusty harmonica."}
{1: '1', 3: 'The singer looks troubled.'}
{2: 'Barniga', 3: "I'm sorry, my teacher died in the ARU's last battle...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Barniga', 3: "I'm not good at describing disasters, so I can't tell you about the world as it is...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Barniga', 3: "I can't sing about the present.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'No one mourns the sad but common remark. The young person quietly apologizes for asking.'}
{2: 'Barniga', 3: "It's okay...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Barniga', 3: "After winter ends, maybe I'll sing new songs...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The refugees go silent, knowing that false hope is the worst thing on these snow plains.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'She fiddles with a die in her hand in complete silence.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The gravedigger flips through the pages, where knowledge, reason, desire, and chaos are frozen in the printed words.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1123.jpg'}
{3: 'She once saw twin suns rise on the plains and rings in the sky that shone brighter than stars.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4101_14.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{3: 'Cries lost in the vacuum, buried in a warship graveyard that glittered like stardust.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4101_14.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory647.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{3: 'And on the tower, a wounded hero, whose scarred body rips open the "future" in time\'s curtain.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3801_10.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Time is neither kind nor malicious.', 4: '1'}
{3: "It's just fair.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'And she has already made her choice.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Mercy is a quiet virtue.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Wither to Shine', 2: 'Chapter 33', 3: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Atlas/CommonLogo/BgLogo1.png'}
{1: 'ThemeEnable'}
